snippet.title: Parallax [Indie Game] - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Parallax, the interdimensional puzzle platformer, is now on Steam, Humble and itch.io!
Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/325060
Website: http://www.toastygames.com
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/product/parallax/bSDLfkj232
itch.io: http://toastygames.itch.io/parallax

Genres: Indie, Puzzle, Platformer
Platforms: PC, Mac OSX, Linux
Languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian

Parallax is an interdimensional puzzle platformer with two overlapping worlds. Weave back and forth between black and white as you try to be in the right place, in the right dimension, at the right time. Use switches, boosters and gravity to help you reach the exit. Can you conquer every mind-bending level?
